00034 #ifndef HARPS_BUFFER
00035 #define HARPS_BUFFER
00036 
00037 #include <harps/config.hpp>
00038 
00039 namespace harps {
00044   template< typename _SampleType >
00045     class Buffer {
00046       public:
00047         typedef _SampleType SampleType;
00051         Buffer() : is_stereo( 0 ), continue_request( 0 ), end_request( 0 ), used( false ) {}
00055         virtual ~Buffer() {}
00059         inline SampleType *get() {
00060           return buffer[ 0 ];
00061         }
00066         inline SampleType *getLeft() {
00067           return buffer[ 0 ];
00068         }
00073         inline SampleType *getRight() {
00074           return buffer[ is_stereo ];
00075         }
00080         inline const SampleType *get() const {
00081           return buffer[ 0 ];
00082         }
00087         inline const SampleType *getLeft() const {
00088           return buffer[ 0 ];
00089         }
00094         inline const SampleType *getRight() const {
00095           return buffer[ is_stereo ];
00096         }
00100         inline void setStereo() {
00101           is_stereo = 1;
00102         }
00106         inline void setMonoral() {
00107           is_stereo = 0;
00108         }
00113         inline bool isStereo() const {
00114           return is_stereo;
00115         }
00121         inline void requestContinue() {
00122           continue_request++;
00123         }
00129         inline void requestEnd() {
00130           end_request++;
00131         }
00135         inline void reset() {
00136           continue_request = 0;
00137           end_request = 0;
00138           used = false;
00139         }
00146         inline bool shouldEnd() {
00147           if( end_request && !( continue_request ) )
00148             return true;
00149           else
00150             return false;
00151         }
00156         inline void mergeVote( const Buffer< _SampleType > &_source ) {
00157           continue_request += _source.continue_request;
00158           end_request += _source.end_request;
00159         }
00164         inline unsigned int getContinueRequestCount() const {
00165           return continue_request;
00166         }
00171         inline unsigned int getEndRequestCount() const {
00172           return end_request;
00173         }
00177         void setUsed() {
00178           used = true;
00179         }
00184         bool getUsed() const {
00185           return used;
00186         }
00187       private:
00188         bool used;
00189         int is_stereo;
00190         SampleType buffer[ 2 ][ SAMPLE_COUNT ];
00191         unsigned int continue_request;
00192         unsigned int end_request;
00193     };
00194 }
00195 
00196 #endif
